summary: CinemaLandVR is a VR game specifically designed for immersive cinemas. It offers a diverse range of architectural modules and an extensive selection of furniture. Players can build their own dream villa in the embrace of nature, creating a magical and immersive movie-watching experience.

name: Circadian Cycle Deepest Sleep
summary: Circadian Cycle Deepest Sleep is a low-poly 3d horror indie game. You wake up in an infinite corridor and try to figure out what is on the paintings.

name: Cities: Skylines - Coast to Coast Radio
summary: Cities: Skylines - Coast to Coast Radio is a DLC for the city simulation game Cities: Skylines. Coast to Coast Radio is the perfect destination for music that will make you feel like you're heading out on a grand adventure! With 16 bold and uplifting songs from DJ Toni G, city builders can clear their minds and focus on creating their dream city with tracks that inspire you to build higher and plan better.

name: Cipher Complex
summary:
Cipher Complex is an unreleased stealth action video game that was being developed for the Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 systems by Edge of Reality. The game was first announced in June 2006, by which time it was reported to already have been in production and self-funded for two years; the title was then signed with Sega in 2007, but in July 2009 it was revealed that the game had been cancelled by the publisher earlier that year after over half a decade of work, as noted in the LinkedIn profile of a former internal producer at the studio. Further details surrounding the cancellation and the game's fate in their entirety remain unclear to this day, as no official announcement regarding its status has been made by either Sega or Edge of Reality, however, more recently, a U.S. federal trademark registration was filed on September 11, 2009, which as of October 19, 2011, has been granted a third extension. While confirming nothing else, this does indicate that Edge of Reality has retained the intellectual property rights to the game.

Although the game was widely believed to be permanently cancelled by Sega, game designer Phil Fogerite (who worked as level designer on the project from March 2008 to April 2009) has most recently stated that Edge of Reality itself had in fact decided to put the game on indefinite hold.

name: Cinnet
summary: An endless night in a house infested with demons in first person!

name: Cinco Noches Con Mi Tío Raúl
summary:
Well, you got a new summer job in "Uncle Raul's Pizzeria" because you need some money. This new job consist in check cameras to ensure the local during the night. But in your first day, you start to notice weird things around you...

You must be intelligent and use your limited resources to survive five nights to Uncle Raul and his friends.

name: City of Broken Dreamers: Book One
summary: City of Broken Dreamers is a mature, adults-only cyberpunk visual novel. In the game, you will find a choice-based, visually erotic and exciting adventure.

name: Circus Convoy
summary: The Heartland Traveling Circus is on the move, with a huge convoy of semis hauling down the highway. In CIRCUS CONVOY, you are Andre the Magnificent, resident strongman a.k.a. "the Chameleon". As the Big-Topbarrels down the black top, Andre learns that a rival has sabotaged their gear, possibly scrapping the next show. Andre springs into action because, as everyone knows, the show must go on!

name: Citrus Rampage
summary: Call up your buddies and enjoy the acidic chaos of Citrus Rampage, a physics-based multiplayer shooter with silly guns and destructible environments. Play with up to 4 players in local multiplayer or online using Steam Remote Play Together.

name: Cicada
summary: This game is a roguelite simulation action title, where you play as a single cicada striving to survive the summer in the Japanese countryside.

name: Cities: Skylines - Stadia Edition
summary: The stadia edition included the "After Dark" day/night cycle expansion, and the free "Match Day" stadium DLC.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Shopping Malls
summary: It's time for some retail extravaganza! With the Content Creator Pack “Shopping Malls” by community modder KingLeno you can bring your shopping experience to the next level, adding a variety of shopping areas to your City.

name: City of Jade: Imperial Frontier
summary: City Of Jade: Imperial Frontier is an indie real time strategy game. Develop the economy of your settlement, gain resources, create and improve buildings, and track the people's mood to try to keep them satisfied. However, life in the country is not always calm. It's important for a governor to be able to deal with emergencies and make wise decisions. Go down in history as a wise and talented governor!

name: City Transport Simulator: Bus DLC - Gräf/Steyr NG235
summary: The NG235 offers deep simulation with analog systems and a more hands-on driving style. It was the first Viennese Low-floor Bus and offers enough depth for players who enjoy a slightly older vehicle setup.

name: Cinema Manager
summary: Cinema manager will get you into a tycoon imperium of movie theatres! Remember, Rome wasn't built in a day! Transform your business from a single screening room into a chain of exclusive cinemas! Design your movie theatre, choose the repertoire, and attract customers! It's time for a grand premiere!

name: Cirno's Not So Ice Day
summary:
Cirno was invited to a picnic at the top of a mountain, but she accidentally encased her feet in ice. Despite losing her ability to fly, she wants to reach the top, so she'll have to find her way up using her new ice block skates. She cannot stop moving once she starts and can only rely on her jump timing.

This is a rage platformer similar to Jump King and Getting Over it.
Game can take about 45-60 minutes or more on a first playthrough.

name: Cities: Skylines - Snowfall
summary: Cities: Skylines - Snowfall is an expansion for the city simulation game Cities: Skylines. Snowfall will allow mayor-players to expand and grow their cities using new transportation options while challenging them to meet citizens' needs using several new in-game tools. All of these new inclusions will revolve around the expansion's central feature: an in-game weather system.

name: Civil War: 1863
summary: Relive iconic battles of the American Civil War. Take command of both the Union and Confederate forces in this exciting turn-based strategy game.

name: Cinnabunny
summary: Cinnabunny is a cozy life simulator game where you play as a bunny who runs a bakery. Unlock new recipes, go birdwatching, collect mushrooms, and charm your community. Save up enough carrots to help your family move.

name: Cinnamon: Yume no Daibouken
summary: Cinnamon: Yume no Daibouken is an Action game, published by Imagineer, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: City of God I: Prison Empire
summary: City of God I: Prison Empire is a prison themed RPG simulation game. Build your prison freely and make prisoners work for you with maximum efficiency by providing all kinds of prison facilities. Build different kinds of workshops to keep your prisoners working hard and earning money from the market. Find the specially skilled prisoners from the government and police database, and make those people work in your prison. Work as the warden to unlock different projects. Time your selling at the right time at the market. Make more money to expand your prison empire and use money to influence politicians and gangs in the city.

name: Ciudad Alfombra
summary: In this game, you must dodge the obstacles in the city and complete the missions available. There is a wide variety of vehicles and colors, such as minivans and large buses.

name: Citrus Summer
summary: 以都市职场生活为背景的百合视觉小说， 作为在大城市游戏行业996的独身社畜， 想要改变却无能为力的吴依， 偶然间得到了一次改变命运的机会……

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Map Pack 2
summary: Get some new inspiration and build more diverse Cities with “Map Pack 2” from the community modder Sidai. This Content Creator Pack adds 10 maps that represent different biomes such as Boreal, Desert, Tropical, and Temperate.

name: Cipher Monk
summary: Cipher Monk is a game about a numeric system made by the cistercian monks in the 13th century. Your goal is to use this numeric system to give the answer needed and solve the puzzles.

name: Cities: Skylines - Xbox One Edition
summary:
Cities: Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation genre. The game introduces new game play elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience. From the makers of the Cities in Motion franchise, the game boasts a fully realized transport system. It also includes the ability to mod the game to suit your play style as a fine counter balance to the layered and challenging simulation. You're only limited by your imagination, so take control and reach for the sky!

The Xbox One Edition includes the base game and the popular After Dark expansion, allowing players to plan and design for their cities' nightlife and tourist attractions.

name: Citizen Sleeper: Episode - Purge
summary: With the release of Episode Purge, Citizen Sleeper’s three episode post-launch DLC expansion is now complete and the game has even more to offer with a thrilling late game storyline that delivers an immersive new narrative arc introducing additional characters, lore and locations. Players returning to Erlin’s Eye might even find themselves running into some familiar faces!

name: Cities: Skylines - Relaxation Station
summary: Take the stress out of your streets and relax while you re-district in this first-ever music pack for Cities: Skylines, featuring over an hour of original music for use with the in-game radio stations composed by Tobias Gustavsson, composer of popular music packs for Europa Universalis IV and Crusader Kings II. Listen to Soothing jazz, lounge music, groove music, or even pleasant Caribbean vibes in between savy radio host Jason. You might also come across a commercial or two for your favorite food chain or Insurance provider. So tune in, kick back, and let our in-game DJ spin the relaxing playlist for your listening pleasure.

name: Cities: Skylines - Match Day
summary: Cities: Skylines - Match Day is a DLC for the city simulation game Cities: Skylines. Available for free, Match Day allows mayor-players to add stadiums to their towns - and comes with all of the benefits and challenges of hosting major sporting events in their citizens' backyard.

name: Cities: Skylines - Carols, Candles and Candy
summary: Cities: Skylines - Carols, Candles and Candy is a DLC for the city simulation game Cities: Skylines. With Carols, Candles and Candy, yule feel right at home with five new Christmas carols remade in multiple genres: Classic Jazz, Latin Jazz, Country, Indie and Indietronica. The songs will be randomly played across existing radio stations once you download the free DLC. Besides, you can't prove Chirpy is not a partridge, and Paradox Interactive is spelled with No L. Happy holidays, city-builders.

name: Cities: Skylines - Country Road Radio
summary: Country Road Radio, playing 16 original new songs in four sub-genres: Appalachian Folk, Bluegrass / Honky Tonk, Nashville Modern Country, and Unplugged Country. The radio host is pure Dixieland Delight, spinning six instrumental songs and 10 with original vocals.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Circus of TimTim
summary: Circus of TimTim is a Stealth Horror Survival Game about two siblings trying to sneak inside the most hunted carnival of all time to recover lost items with a metal detector device, however enemies are roaming around and they can hear your every step! TimTim is not happy ..

name: Cipheur
summary: Cipheur is a free cryptogram game allowing you to test your logic and language skills against 100 quotes by famous people.

name: City Wars: Tokyo Reign
summary: City Wars: Tokyo Reign takes the customization and strategy of a traditional CCG and introduces a dynamic battlefield where tactile mechanics and turn-based battling combine. Choose a Faction, build a Combat Case and take to the streets.

name: City Racing 2
summary: City Racing 2 is a fun real racing game with top 3D graphics and high quality, giving you the ultimate visual enjoyment. It gathers more than 50 top classic cars and also designs a brand new challenge for you! You can customize to create a car that reflects your personal style, plunge into a thrilling speed race, use your superb driving skills to conquer rivals, win epic races, and create your own ace car club to become a legend of the track.
publishers: 成都羽珀科技有限责任公司

name: City Block
summary:
A kid decides to help its town. Complete mission for different professions or take a break and race through the roads and streets of the town on a motorcycle, kickbike or skateboard, play some football or ride a sheep!

City Block is a town simulation game focused on driving in a big pixel car playmat with gameplay similar to the early auto theft games.

name: City of Stories: The Professor's Secret - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you help a young peasant girl chase her scientific dreams?

name: City Traffic Driver 2
summary: Enter the intricate shopping area and explore it in one of 10 cool cars! Complete Parking, Delivery & Transport missions! Show your driving proficiency in SUVs, minibuses and utility trucks.

name: Citadelum
summary: Citadelum is a city builder set in legendary Ancient Rome. Build your own settlement, gather resources and evolve it into a magnificent city. Explore the world, trade and lead your mighty legions in epic tactical battles. Earn the favor of the Gods or challenge them, if you dare.

name: Circadian Dice
summary:
Circadian Dice is a game inspired by single-player deck-building games, but instead of upgrading a deck, you build up a set of dice!

The game has 26 different scenarios to fight through, each designed to allow for short game sessions. You can also play in different game modes, like playing through the game in a single-life Campaign Mode, as well as an endless randomized scenario.

Between every game, your dice are reset - but you unlock abilities, new characters, and powerful relics that become part of your permanent arsenal.

name: City of Gangsters: Shadow Government
summary: Control city politicians and manipulate laws in New York and beyond, in the new expansion pack City of Gangsters: Shadow Government.

name: Circle of Blood
summary: Circle of Blood is a 2D adventure game played from a third-person perspective. The player uses a point-and-click interface to interact with the environment and to guide protagonist George Stobbart through the game's world. To solve puzzles and progress in the game, the player collects items that may be combined with one another, used on the environment, or given to non-player characters. The protagonist converses with NPCs via dialogue trees presented through "conversation icons" to learn about the game's puzzles and plot. Clues and other information are obtained by clicking on items in the inventory and on objects in the environment. The player navigates with a map, to which new locations are added as the story unfolds. Unlike in most adventure games at the time, the protagonist's death is possible, after which the player starts from the last save point.

name: Cineveo: Virtual Reality Cinema
summary: Cineveo is a super immersive VR Cinema experience, with the most detailed and beautifully designed VR Cinema environments on the market. Experience total presence in VR, as you watch your videos inside a collection of ultra-realistic VR Cinemas with AAA graphics and powerful features.

name: Cities: Skylines - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Cities: Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation genre. The game introduces new game play elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience. From the makers of the Cities in Motion franchise, the game boasts a fully realized transport system. It also includes the ability to mod the game to suit your play style as a fine counter balance to the layered and challenging simulation. You're only limited by your imagination, so take control and reach for the sky!

Included in the Deluxe Edition are 5 In-game historical monuments from around the world, the games original soundtrack, and a digital art book.

name: Cinema Simulator 2025
summary: Cinema Simulator 2025 is a simulation game where you will manage your own movie theater and test your strategy and management skills. Starting from a small movie theater, try to become a giant in the movie industry.

name: City Tales: Medieval Era
summary: Build medieval cities teeming with life and tales untold. Forge organic urban landscapes and manage a rich economy whilst building bonds with companions whose stories are intertwined with the fate of your city.

name: Citizen Sleeper
summary: Roleplaying in the ruins of interplanetary capitalism. Live the life of an escaped worker, washed-up on a lawless station at the edge of an interstellar society. Inspired by the flexibility and freedom of TTRPGs, explore the station, choose your friends, escape your past and change your future.

name: Circle Killer
summary: play the role of "circle" to avoid incoming blocks with rhythmic music now have two different levels Fall Level: Accompanied by dynamic music you will move freely around the area, avoiding falling blocks Traversal Level: You will continue traversing a section of road with rhythmic music

name: Circloo
summary: A physics platformer with growing circular levels.

name: Circus Electrique
summary: Circus Electrique is part story-driven RPG, part tactics, part circus management, and completely enthralling - all with a steampunk twist. When everyday Londoners mysteriously turn into vicious killers, only the show's talented performers possess the skills necessary to save the city.

name: City Car Parking Simulator
summary: Enjoy city driving in the City Car Parking Simulator, full of realistic driving experiences and challenging parking missions. Customize your vehicle and test your skills in this simulation game that offers a unique atmosphere with its graphics.

name: Cilla
summary:
Cilla is a dynamic 2D side-scrolling shooter that immerses players into the complex narrative of humanity's evolution and the endless struggle for survival at any cost.

You will acquaint themselves with Cilla - a mysterious entity thrust into the heart of war. She is the Perfect Soldier. Devoid of pain, fear, and remorse. Her journey intertwines with the harsh present and what seems to be an inevitable future, as endless losses and extraterrestrial threats pursue her at every turn. But what will happen when Cilla faces her most challenging trial - a choice that will change everything?

Game Features:

Narrative Twist: Immerse yourself in the story of the Perfect Soldier in an alternate future universe. Experience her emotions and confront a moral choice that will impact Cilla's fate and that of all humanity.

Beautiful Pixel Graphics: Enjoy handcrafted game landscapes, meticulously designed multi-layered backgrounds, and unique enemies in each level.

Challenging and Dynamic Combat: Demonstrate maximum agility, collect bonuses, evade enemy fire, and study their behavior and attacks throughout the gripping story of the game.

Take up the challenge and determine the fate of the world!

name: City Transport Simulator: Tram Depot + Southern-Route Add-On
summary: Experience the most exciting map expansion for CTS: Tram yet!

name: Citadel Siege
summary: Can your strategy hold against the darkness?

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Mid-Century Modern
summary: Rediscover the modernist movement of the 60s with this pack made by REV0. The MCM aesthetic provides you with a new way to customize your city, including the classic 1-story homes, road-side restaurants and hotels.

name: Circle Empires Rivals
summary: Circle Empires Rivals is a fast-paced multiplayer RTS where you and your friends will take control of your own tiny kingdoms and conquer a world made of circles. Each one is overflowing with enemies to fight, monsters to hunt and loot to horde - but watch out... Friends can quickly become rivals!

name: City of Hunger
summary:
A parasitic outbreak turns the city’s residents into ravenous and violent creatures, plunging everything into total chaos.

After an accident during a special operation, you must fight to survive while crossing dark streets and infested houses until the rescue team arrives.

name: Citizen Pain
summary: Citizen Pain is a first-person dark fantasy action game. Play as Catherina, warrior princess of the Moges Empire, who gains the supernatural force known as Pain and leads the fight against the Undead King. Classic single-player combat meets modern visuals in this skill-based indie experience.

name: City of Brass
summary:
Armed with scimitar and versatile whip, lash, slash, trick and trap
your way through the City of Brass, a first-person rogue-lite of treasure, snares and ghoulish foes.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Map Pack
summary: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Map Pack features 8 new maps by "Sanctum Gamer", where you can unleash your creativity and plan new metropolises.

name: City Car Driving
summary: City Car Driving is a realistic car driving simulator. The game will help you master the basic skills of the car driving in various traffic conditions as you plunge into an environment most closely resembling the real one.

name: Cities: Skylines - Remastered
summary: Cities: Skylines - Remastered puts you in charge of a growing city, from the ground-breaking of its first streets to the ever-changing needs of thousands of citizens. Design, build, and manage the city of your dreams, from public services to civic policies, and challenge yourself to grow from a simple town to a bustling metropolitan hub.

name: Circuit Artist
summary: Design chips to solve challenges and progress to harder and more complex designs.

name: City Transport Simulator: Tram
summary:
Become a tram driver! Hop back into the cab for the ultimate tram driving experience. Drive modern real-world trams from various cities with physics indistinguishable from the real thing.

Take to the rails and transport passengers while sticking to the timetable and strategically set up your own tram routes by choosing from the many stations to build up a fully functioning and effective tram network.

name: City of Murals
summary: City of Murals is a cute and gross, action-platformer, rogue-lite. Explore a colorful world with violent and non-violent guns, special traversal abilities, and creatures that range from friendly to deadly. The world is competing to see who can live the longest. How long will you survive?

name: Cineris Somnia
summary: Cineris Somnia is a 3D adventure through a beautifully strange and mesmerizing world - and a young girl's cruel and forlorn dreams.

name: Cities in Motion
summary: Rendered in rich detail, four of the world's greatest cities - Vienna, Helsinki, Berlin, and Amsterdam - await the steady hand of a planner to manage their transportation needs in Cities in Motion, a city-based mass transportation simulation game. Overseeing the changing needs of people from 1920 to 2020, it's up to you to manage everything from buses, trams and subway trains to maximize profits while pleasing commuters.

name: City of Springs
summary: Craft & modify your own robot drones to fight off a cruel regime in City of Springs, a steampunk adventure game. Use your drones in tactical combat against an army of drones. Sneak into forbidden areas, help the people rebel, and explore the streets of Riveton.

name: Civitatem
summary: Civitatem is a medieval city builder where you help your villagers raise a new settlement in dangerous lands by making use of their skills and available world resources.

name: Citizen Kane 64
summary: The Citizen Kane of Gaming

name: Civics Scribble
summary: Test your knowledge of U.S. Civics while drawing lines for the inquisitive Mr. Apple to roll on or bounce off of to navigate challenges such as spikes, bouncy blocks and teleporters. Make your way through 96 levels across nine scenic locations based on real-life state and National Parks.

name: CitrusBall
summary: Select a powerful character with unique abilities to face off in a designed-for-VR sport inspired by tennis and pickleball.

name: City of Stories: The Hunter's Heart - Collector's Edition
summary: This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

name: Cirrus Business
summary: Help Cloudi and friends restore their home in this whimsical story-driven farming adventure. You’ll learn that growing and managing magical crops while defending against the slobsters isn’t a breeze, but very serious business.

name: Cities: Skylines - Industries
summary: In one of the most in-depth expansions in Cities: Skylines history, Industry becomes a larger and more meaningful part of the game with this expansion. Players can customize their industrial areas with supply chains for the four different resource types and unique factories. Well managed industry areas will level up and become more efficient. Aside from production chains, there is a new city service for handling mail and the cargo airport eases import and export of factory goods. There are FIVE new maps, new policies, new city services, new buildings (including resource extractors, manufacturers, warehouses and unique factories) and more.

name: Cities: Skylines - Green Cities
summary: Cities: Skylines - Green Cities is a new expansion for the city-builder from Colossal Order, adding new ways for players to build earth-friendly towns. The expansion adds 350 new assets to the core game, adding a massive selection of new visual options, complete with eco-friendly buildings, organic shops, electric vehicles, and new services designed to make pollution a quaint notion of the past. Players can create more diversified cities, or go completely green as the urban population grows. New in-game services and buildings arrive alongside revisions to noise and environmental pollution, making the skies safer for Chirper at last.

name: Citadel: Forged With Fire
summary: Citadel: Forged With Fire is a massive online sandbox RPG with elements of magic, spellcasting and inner-kingdom conflict. You have complete freedom to pursue your own destiny; hatch plots of trickery and deceit to ascend the ranks among allies and enemies, become an infamous hunter of other players, build massive and unique castles, tame mighty beasts to do your bidding, and visit uncharted territories to unravel their rich and intriguing history. The path to ultimate power and influence is yours to choose.

name: City Story
summary: City Story is a horror-suspense-declassification game. The story begins through the production of a paranormal program, where a newbie cameraman and a down-on-his-luck producer visit a series of paranormal legends happening in Japan for the program.

name: Civil War: 1864
summary: Civil War: 1864 is the latest addition to our Civil War strategy series, bringing you the ferocious battles from 1864. Experience the American Civil War like never before with with over 40 missions; including 20 detailed historical battles.

name: Cities: Skylines - Parklife
summary: Cities: Skylines - Parklife is a playful new expansion, making your city more alive with new amusement parks, nature reserves, city parks and zoos, and giving new life to your empty land with custom parks and gardens. With everything from roller coasters and campsites to flower beds, fountains and flamingos, Parklife adds new ways to play, with the introduction of a new park area tool and level-up features that increase your parks property values, along with five new maps and a ton of assets in play.

name: Cities: Skylines - Mass Transit
summary: Mass Transit brings several new systems into play to help citizens traverse their towns in speed and style. Commuters can now get around on the water, up high mountain peaks, and even through the sky thanks to the addition of ferries, monorails, cable cars, and blimps to the game.

name: Cities: Skylines - Plazas & Promenades
summary: Say Goodbye to noise and pollution and Hello to pedestrian streets, car-free areas, and modern plazas. It’s time to level up your Cities with this environment-friendly expansion!

name: Cities: Skylines - Natural Disasters
summary: Cities: Skylines - Natural Disasters is a DLC for the city simulation game Cities: Skylines. Natural Disasters features a catalog of catastrophes to challenge mayor-players everywhere, including planning with early warning systems and emergency routes, devastating and destructive disaster effects, and caring for the populace as they struggle to rebuild. The expansion will also update Cities: Skylines with a new scenario editor and gameplay mode, allowing players to finally win - or lose - the game on their own terms.

name: City of Dolorosa
summary: You've just died—and your trial for the ultimate sin begins. City of Dolorosa is an interactive fiction and first-person exploration game with handmade india ink graphics. Meet the Five Great Powers and uncover all the secrets that lie within Dolorosa, the cruelest city in Hell.

name: City Adventure Touch: Mystery of Triangle
summary: CITY ADVENTURE touch MYSTERY OF TRIANGLE is an action game for the Famicom and NES system that was published by Toho in 1987. The game is based on the high school and baseball team themed manga Touch. City Adventure Touch is somewhat notorious in Japan for bearing absolutely no resemblance to the source material. A comic book concerning the Mystery of Triangle is included in the manual. The story appears to revolve around a character's dog who disappears into an alternate dimension, and the three children who attempt to rescue it, one of which attacks by throwing baseballs.

name: City Builder
summary:
Solve pipe puzzles in time to build cities in a wacky, cartoon world.

City Builder gives a fresh and wacky take on the classic pipe puzzle game by expanding gameplay to three overlapping levels: Roads, water and electricity. Connect puzzle pieces and watch your cities grow in a madcap cartoon environment. Race against time by picking your puzzle pieces from a rotating dispensary. Along the way you'll encounter curous creatures like the shy Bigfoot, which you can scare away with your oversized flash camera, and use dynamite to blow up rocks in your path.

name: Circle Up
summary: Blocks, portals, spikes and other tricky obstacles, that will test your skills on your way to top.

name: Cities: Skylines - Campus
summary: Back to school! In Cities: Skylines - Campus, university life abounds with new area types for any sort of student - Trade School, Liberal Arts and University. Increase the reputation of your campus by attracting students and creating Academic Works to unlock new buildings. Build five types of varsity sports arenas and nine unique faculties, employ seven new policies, earn seven new achievements and take on five new maps! Campus takes higher education to new heights with everything you need to graduate magna cum laude.

name: City 20
summary: Embark on a dystopian-tinged survival sandbox adventure where the world dynamically responds to your actions. Craft your own narrative through a series of choices, navigating harsh environmental conditions and organized factions, and delving into unsolved mysteries.

name: Cities: Skylines - Financial Districts
summary: Boost the economy of your City with a financial district, and use your funds to invest in the best industries for your population. Financial Districts adds the new feature “Investments” and more than a hundred assets to the game.

name: Cities in Motion 2
summary: Cities in Motion 2 (CIM2) is the sequel to the popular mass transit simulation game Cities in Motion. Build, manage and lead your transportation network to provide cities with their ever changing needs. Cities in Motion 2 introduces new features including multiplayer game modes, day and night cycles, timetables and dynamic cities.

name: Circa Infinity
summary: Circa Infinity is an arcade puzzle platformer filled with action. Reach the core of each level by slipping through a series of circular layers. Time your jumps carefully to avoid the creatures that reside within the circles and reach the next layer. As you go deeper, the action gets faster and more challenging! Can you keep up? The standard mode includes 50 stages of mind-bending action, with 5 bosses that will test your nerves. You can also measure your time yourself in speedrun mode.

name: City of Gangsters
summary: Start a crime syndicate from nothing, and grow it into a well-oiled money machine in City of Gangsters, a mafia management simulation game. Build speakeasies and illegal distilleries. Manage production chains and resource distribution. Smuggle goods from out of town and bribe the police to look the other way. Grow a powerful crew and keep your rivals under your thumb. Eliminate competition and rule the city. But most importantly, keep the money flowing.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Train Stations
summary:
Train Stations features 12 stations and 4 hubs, created by BadPeanut.

Whether your city would benefit from an elevated or below-ground station, there are new mass transit options to meet your needs, featuring several stylish train and metro stations, so your citizens can efficiently get where they need to go.

Modern transport network
Enhance your network with modern-looking stations that match Sunset Harbor and Mass Transit expansions perfectly.

name: Citizens of Space
summary: The Earth is missing and it's up to you to find the pieces and solve the mystery behind its disappearance! Recruit citizens, navigate the cosmos, and battle charismatic foes in Citizens of Space!

name: Cirno's Perfect Summer Vacation
summary: This game was made for the ⑨ Jam, a special Cirno Touhou game jam!

name: Circles
summary: Circles is an abstract puzzle game that takes your mind off things. No words, no distractions: an invitation to experiment. Relax, let your mind wander and discover the puzzling possibilities of circles.

name: Circus Atari
summary: 3 rows of triangular balloons move along the top part of the screen, each overlaid with blue, green, and yellow (colors used in the original version), counting from the top row. A clown appears from the edge of the screen where there is a jumping board, and the player must move the seesaw located at the bottom of the screen so that the clown can bounce back off the seesaw once he jumps off from his starting position. If the player successfully gets the clown onto the seesaw, the clown on the other side shoots off into the air towards the 3 rows of balloons on the top of the screen. The clown may not have enough speed to reach the balloons if the first clown does not land squarely on the seesaw. Clowns bounce off of balloons, walls, and jumping boards, but will pass directly through multiple balloons if they are moving quickly enough. They will only bounce off the jumping boards when they are heading downwards, and will pass straight through the boards while moving upwards.

name: Cities: Skylines - Concerts
summary:
Cities: Skylines - Concerts is a mini-expansion for the award-winning city builder that gives players the power to plan and present major concerts.

Featuring music and images from Rock, EDM, and Pop/Folk bands - as well as a new music focused radio station - Concerts brings a more melodic component to the sounds of city life.

name: Cinemaster Cinema Simulator
summary: Run your own cinema! Set showtimes, print tickets, buy new films, pop popcorn, upgrade and clean theaters. Vending machines, staffs, upgrades, and much more are coming soon!

name: Cinderella Phenomenon
summary:
''Cinderella Phenomenon" is a visual novel game developed by Dicesuki. Players take on the role of Lucette, a princess who is cursed by a fairy godmother and must break the curse to find true love. The game features a variety of branching storylines and multiple endings, depending on the choices the player makes throughout the game.

The game is set in the kingdom of Angielle, a fantasy world filled with magic and intrigue. As Lucette, players must navigate a complex web of relationships and political intrigue, as well as confront their own personal demons. Along the way, they will meet a cast of memorable characters, including potential love interests and allies, as well as enemies who seek to thwart their quest.

The game features stunning hand-drawn art, immersive music, and engaging gameplay. With its rich storyline, compelling characters, and branching paths, "Cinderella Phenomenon" is a must-play game for fans of visual novels, fantasy, and romance.

name: Citizens of Earth
summary: As the newly elected Vice President of the World, it's your job to save the Earth by recruiting friends, family, and the local townsfolk! ...A true politician would never get his own hands dirty, after all!

name: Cinderella Nine in August
summary: Japanese bishoujo baseball game released on Android and iOS devices.

name: Cinderella Princess Makeup and Dressup Salon Game
City Limits
summary: Relax and build cities on a desolate tranquil island. Plan ahead to cover the island efficiently by combining buildings and cementing your place on a tile. Each turn an entity spreads, attempting to take over barren or unstable tiles.

name: City Bus Simulator 2019
summary: Drive Beach coach bus in Public transportation bus games. The best game of 2019.

name: City of Doom
summary: A game featured in Action 52.

name: Cinnabar Kamen
summary: Tokusatsu-themed single plane beat em up.

name: Cidadão de SP Simulator
summary: Adapted from Molleindustria's The New York Times Simulator, Cidadão de SP Simulator is a newspaper simulator where you assume the role of a newly hired editor. To keep your job, you have to make three layers of society happy: The rich, Israel and the police.

name: City Fighter
summary: One of the games released in Pop Station models. It is a Street Fighter clone.

name: City Transport Map Volume 2
summary: A map pack of various European cities.

name: Circular
summary: Circular is an arcade scoring game.

name: Circle
summary: Circle is an indie nurturing adventure game. Nurture "Circle" and explore the "Outside" of the room. You must procure foods for the "Circle" and love the "Circle" for yourself.

name: City Island 5
summary: Free offline city building sim. Grow your town to a city on multiple islands!

name: Circus Attractions
summary: Practice five events trampolining, tightrope-walking, juggling, knife-throwing and jumping clowns, before doing the events in the main performance.

name: Cinema Simulator
summary: "Cinema Simulator" is a simulation video game, here you can experience watching movies in the cinema! What do you want to see!

name: Ciikos Bridge
summary: Talk & trade with forest folk to find your way home!

name: City Guesser
summary: Geographic discovery game that utilizes real video footage of different cities. Players are placed into a random city with an abundance of sounds, sights, a people. Users must use their surroundings, to make the an accurate guess of the video location.

name: Circulation
summary: Manipulate strange machines and use their mechanics to rotate the platforms around you. Create pathways by manipulating and aligning platforms. Solve the puzzles that surround you, uncover hidden paths, and strive to escape the challenging maze.

name: City Metro Simulator
summary: In this simulator you will act as a metro driver driving above the city. T

name: Cirno's Lost Chirumiru
summary: Cirno was chilling with her Chirumiru, after drinking one, she goes to grab another and she realizes they are all gone. She takes it upon herself to get all her Chirumiru back and to find out who stole them.

name: Ciel Nosurge: Ushinawareta Hoshi e Sasagu Shi Agent Pack
Circle Rally Party
summary: Circle Rally Party is a 1 to 4 players local multiplayer party game with mini games about doing donuts with cars. Use your car's unique attack at the right time, and collect power-ups to improve your odds. Traffic rules do not apply!

name: Circulario
summary: Circulario is a simple yet addictive puzzle game with an experimental mechanics, intuitive controls and minimalistic design. Test your instincts, reaction, logical thinking and the ability to anticipate.

name: City Bus Simulator
summary: Buckle up and navigate the streets—and skies—like a pro city bus driver!

name: City Escape
summary: Restore a farm and solve puzzles!

name: City Country
summary: City Country is a city-building game where you manage resources, population, knowledge. You control various sectors of the city like education, medicine, culture, tourism, trading.

name: Citizen Witch
summary: Explore the city, meet monsters, help folks!

name: CircusTroupe
summary: This is my personal game.

name: Circus Baby's Diner
summary: Welcome to Circus Baby's Diner! It's a place to have loads of fun and enjoy pizza!

name: City Island 3 - Building Sim
summary: If you love village to city building games, then you'll love City Island 3

name: Cinderella: Princess of the Magic Kingdom
summary: After becoming queen, Cinderella enjoys a life of peace and prosperity with her husband and friends. This tranquillity is threatened when a dark force breaks into her life.

name: Circus
summary: Circus is an Action game, developed and published by 505 Games, which was released in Europe in 2010.

name: CivNet
summary: Sid Meier's CivNet is a remake of the original game with added multiplayer, improved graphics and sound, and Windows 3.1/95 support. Gameplay is almost identical to the original game. There are several methods of multiplayer, including LAN, primitive Internet play, hotseat, modem, and direct serial link.

name: CIMA: The Enemy
summary: For decades, the human race and the CIMA race have been in constant conflict with one another. As Ark J, your mission is to guard the gate between the two worlds, protect your appointed town, and ultimately, find peace. You'll progress through a nonlinear storyline while solving puzzles, exploring worlds, and battling enemies. The game includes a combat system that features both action and strategy elements. Another feature lets you activate non-playable characters to help you accomplish your goals.

name: Circuit Breaker
summary:
A pixel puzzle platformer game.

You play as a Robot called V1 to escape from the facility you currently trapped in.

The world is changing and you discover new paths as you explore this world to find your way out of this facility

name: Citypurger
summary: A kinetic brainwipe for citybound psyches! A soothing and informative walking tour of glitchbuild architectural nullities that also cleans out unwanted mental detritus. Let our patented logobuzz hypnotyping technology wash over your buildingweary brainpan... All while you effortlessly fortify your subconscious for future oneiric scenarios! Repeat wash cycles as many times as needed. No two runthroughs are the same!

name: City Panic!
summary: Car chasing bird's eye view game.

name: City of Dusk
summary: Twilight City is a thrilling 3D block zombie defense shooter set in The end of the world is coming, face the endless attacking zombies, please live to the end...

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Railroads of Japan
summary: Discover Japan by train thanks to “Railroads of Japan” from Content Creator Ryuichi Kaminogi. This Content Creator Pack adds authentic Japanese railroad scenery to Cities: Skylines with stations, trains, buses, and more!

name: City Driver
summary: Welcome to City Driver. Your objective in this life-like driving game is simple: Get a job, earn money and gain experience to climb up the job ladder and get better jobs!

name: Cities: Skylines II - Bridges & Ports
summary: Livelier coasts are now available with this new expansion, Bridges & Ports! With a new set of tools you are now able to create a bustling port to your city, and add beautiful new details like draw bridges and lighthouses.

name: Cinnamon fight
summary: Cinnamon fight is a multiplayer game, where you can fight up to three enemies. They can be your friends or random people. This game consists of more than 500 levels, more than 40 weapons and lots of obstacles which are going to have masive impact on your gameplay strategy

name: CityDriver: Autobahn Nord
summary: With the "Autobahn North" DLC for CityDriver, new routes, missions and locations await you!

name: City Mania
summary: Welcome to the best new city-builder game in town! Now is your chance to be the owner of the awesomest city ever! Build, expand, customize -- the decision is in your hands! But don't stop there! Recruit dozens of quirky characters, add them to your collection and watch as they populate the streets and bring your city to life! Certain apps allow you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.

name: Cine2Nerdle
summary:
A daily 4x4 tile-swapping game about matching words that relate to the same movie (or movies).

There are 4 or 5 movies to find in each puzzle. Swap tiles to organize them into rows and/or columns representing movies. Tile colors will change when 4 tiles belonging to the same movie are in the same row or column.

name: Citroën C4 Robot
summary: An online racing game featuring a robot-to-car transforming Citroën's C4 car. There is only one track in the game.

name: CityDriver: Ferdinand Habanero Turbo
summary: Expand your vehicle fleet with a Ferdinand Habanero Turbo, a sleek SUV whose name says it all!

name: City Sweeper - Clean it Fast!
summary: It does a unique task - it cleans the streets of a city. It's is not only a commodity, but an important health issue as well. Cleaning the streets requires a different kind of skill set. Of course, as you are racing against the time, speed is very important. But most important is strategic planning where and how to begin to clean and how to proceed to get the best result.

name: Cities in Motion: Design Now
summary:
Design Now adds five brand new transit options to Cities in Motion. Increase speed, efficiency and capacity with these vehicles:
- Stern-Berger Midi - A product of Swiss standard in solid quality and innovative looks, Midi is a bus primarily intended for dense urban areas. Its light weight, rather short wheelbase and low flooring enable easy maneuvering and boarding.
- Pavlov P-42 - Pavlov Aeronautika factories were established as part of the Pavlov enterprises in the mid-1910s. Ivan Pavlov, a pioneer in rotorcraft design, himself piloted the P-42 on its maiden flight. Originally designed for anti-submarine warfare use, it soon became immensely popular in air taxi business as well. A robust helicopter with relatively low empty weight and slow acceleration, it is especially suited to cover mid-distance passenger and goods transportation needs.
- Stingray Cityjet - The Stingray Cityjet is a fast short-distance catamaran of Australian origin. Recently announced third generation of these vessels have high fuel efficiency and notably low noise emission. These vessels are aimed for regular ferry service and sightseeing use, featuring comfortable seating and a service deck.
- Vagabondo Satellite - Italian-built Vagabondo trams first saw use in Rome during the upgrading of the municipal rail network. The Satellite is a very reliable, although not the most visually appealing, single-body six-axle tram with a partial low-floor configuration. It has driving cabins on both ends of the frame.
- Crescenta T4 Suburbia - A Danish creation, the Crescenta T4 Suburbia is a combined metro/light railway train configuration primarily intended for use between traffic hubs and countryside towns. Its design reflects the origin in more traditional commuter

name: City of God I: Prison Empire - Outrage
summary: Outrage have 5 new gangster persioner into your prison.

name: CityVille
summary: A Facebook Browser game made by Zynga. The game is quite popular and has pulled the amazing feat of amassing more players than Farmville.

name: Civita
summary: Civita is multiplayer FPS game Enjoy easy and fast movements using the rope action. Long TTK is a bonus! (Only supports Steam multiplayer)

name: City Attack 3
summary:
A Survival Horror Zombie Experience.
Will you make it out alive?

name: Citadel's Keeper
summary: Protect your cities against waves of enemies. Manage your resources and plan accordingly to develop your city and armies to survive!

name: Circuitous
summary: Circuitous is an addictive, ludicrous-speed arcade-style puzzler. Avoid rotating barriers as you attempt to navigate to the center.

name: City of Thugs
summary: City of Thugs is a turn-based roguelite RPG, set in the modern world, where you'll have to fight your way through a city full of randomly generated thugs.

name: City Survival Project
summary: The player will play as someone trying to make it in the big city. Within 90 days, the game abstracts the difficulties, pressures, and choices in the form of continuous decision making. This decision-making game is based on a combination of talented and professional pathways, there are over dozens of career paths to advance and over 50...

name: City Transport Simulator: Ultimate Public Bus 2020
City Soarers
summary: Guide a jet aeroplane through the city in this simple action game

name: Circuit: Demolition Derby 2
summary: Smash and Bang your way to the lead in this fun and exciting Demolition game inspired by Banger Racing and Destruction Derbies all around the world.

name: Ciying
summary: A Chinese idiom guessing game that combines pictograms with Wordle guessing

name: City Island 4
summary: Play the most popular big city building simulation game series on mobile!

name: Cien Años Después
summary: Cien Años Después is an indie narrative puzzle/adventure game. All text is in Spanish.

name: Citadale: The Awakened Spirit
summary: A Hero just can't enjoy some peace now, can he? The sexy seductress Succubus is out for revenge on Arion Dorleac just when he wants to get married and get some sexy times on. Because of course she has to attack on his wedding day...

name: Civil Warfare: Another Bullet in the War
summary: CIVIL WARFARE allows you to fight against real players with the Battle Royale style and different game modes. You battle until you are the one last survivor of dozens of people in a Battle Royale style civil war town.

name: Citizen
summary: A lost ex- nasa space marine must meet his family by bypassing the corrupt dictatorship, no freedom of movement. a puzzle adventure game exclusive to Windows 10 and Xbox ONE

name: City Traffic Driver
summary: City Traffic Driver is a racing simulator full of dozens of other drivers on tricky roads. You will have to give it your best shot to live up to the challenge and complete all of the trials. The game tasks you with multiple different challenges that you will have to overcome with your driving skills! Choose your car, buckle up and prove that speed limits don't apply to you.

name: City Find All
summary: City find all is an exciting 3D puzzle game for finding objects in a cozy town. There are many objects on the location, there are numerous buildings, benches, signs, and other urban decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.

name: Citadel Anew
summary: Citadel Anew is a first-person base-building experience. Collect resources, construct infrastructure and manage your colonists. Research new technologies and manufacture new weapons to help you in your fight against the enemy.

name: City of Scary Zombies
summary: City of Scary Zombies is 3D survival shooter about one of the surviving residents of a city where a terrible zombie apocalypse happened many years ago. You and a group of rebels must maintain life at your base, you will be subordinate to the head of the base.

name: City Blocks
summary: City Blocks is a puzzle / deck-building game. Place city blocks so their pipes is aligned and earn new ones as you proceed through the game! A genre-blending game that removes micro management for a more puzzle-like approach to city planning.

name: Cityscape Sprint
summary: Use your momentum in this arcade style platformer to conquer each stage and climb the leaderboards. Enjoy 2-4 hours of tight gameplay in bright, cheerful levels - easy to beat but impossible to perfect.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Sao Paulo
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities: Skylines Collection
summary:
Cities: Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation. The game introduces new game play elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience.

Get the full experience with the Cities: Skylines Collection that features 8 Expansions, 4 Content Creator Packs and 8 Music Packs featuring our own in-house DJ that will spin the tracks while you build your city!

name: City Bucks
summary: In this fun strategy game especially made for two players, you will sit across your opponent playing on a single iPad. Both of you will build shops, cafes, bars, cinemas, museums and many other locations by dragging them onto the city map. Your goal: lure as many citizens as possible into your buildings through strategic building choices and placement, then start earning big cash from your customers to build even more and better buildings! But don't forget to secure your buildings... or you might find them burn down to ashes thanks to monsters, meteors and other types of dangers awaiting you in big city life.

name: Citadel Remonstered
summary:
An updated version of Citadel by Pawel Matusz and Artur Bardowski of the original development team with help from Adam Nowakowski.

This enhanced version removes some bugs discovered over 20 years and improves some aspects of the gameplay such as performance, player control, and an update of the in-game graphics and level design.

name: Circuit Dude
summary: Circuit Dude is a top-down, tile-based puzzler with 100 levels. Help Circuit Dude build his ultimate secret invention by plugging in chips, moving blocks, rotating walls, and much more. You can even create and share your own challenging levels with the built-in level editor!

name: Circadia
summary:
Tap dots and make all the rings hit the white dot at once.
Simple?
Sure, keep telling yourself that.
Try it and see for yourself.

name: Circle the Wagons: Prima Septimana
summary: CTW is a survivors-like top-down-shooter with roguelite and tower-defense elements. Power up your cowboy with unique perks. Reinforce your camp with turrets, traps, and buildings. Survive against waves of hundreds of enemies. Explore unique synergies and builds, using every tool in your arsenal

name: City Defense Z
summary: City Defense Z blends fast-paced survival and base-building in a roguelite experience. Strategically use cards to strengthen defenses and expand your base, then face massive zombie hordes when the night falls. Adapt every run, unlock meta upgrades, and see how long your city can survive.

name: Citadel
summary: Citadel, a.k.a Cytadela, is an FPS released for the Amiga in 1995, and multi-platform open source project since 2006, in which you have to stop a riot on an prison island.

name: Cities: VR - Enhanced Edition
summary: A spin-off of Cities: Skylines, developed with virtual reality headsets in mind. Just like in the original, in Cities: VR we deal with designing entire cities from scratch, which we can see both from the air and from the street level.

name: CipherPilot
summary: Crash across 100+ levels divided into 10+ worlds, each world introducing it's own unique hazards and challenges. Daily, weekly and monthly playlists keeps the challenge fresh as you compete for the top spot.

name: Cities: Skylines - 90s Pop Radio
summary: 90’s lovers out there, this Radio Station is for you! With “90’s Pop” you'll fall in love with this incredible music once again: enjoy 16 new tracks and almost one hour of music.

name: City Siege Sniper
summary:
City Siege is back with a sniper edition! Use stealth to distract some baddies, or use your sniper rifle to pop a bullet in their head. Be sure to save the hostages with minimal casualties, and don't forget to upgrade your guns!

City Siege Sniper takes certain elements of a puzzle game and combines them with a shooter game across its 25 original and brand new levels.

name: City Legends: The Witness in the Rye - Collector's Edition
summary: The line between life and death is as thin as the autumn breeze. Will you escape, or will Darkwood claim you as another victim of its harvest?

name: City Escaper
summary: City escaper is a game based on a gangster escaping from police. City Escaper is a 2D game, dodge the obstacles, run away as long as you can and beat your own highscore!

name: City of Villains
summary:
CoV was released as an "expanshalone" release, or an expansion that did not require the original City of Heroes purchase to work (i.e. stand-alone). It offered five new character archetypes that were, at the time, exclusive to Villain characters, new maps, and began the first PvP Zones (versus the Arena, which were instanced maps made for PvP fighting) of the game. City of Villains also was playable with the same subscription fee that paid for City of Heroes access after buying City of Villains. The retail box included four CD-ROMs for installation current to Issue 6, one of four limited edition HeroClix figures of the game's villains, a poster of a map of the Rogue Isles, and a serial code that gave access to the game and one month of game play.

Since 2008, after the NCSoft acquisition of the intellectual properties, owning either City of Heroes or City of Villains unlocked both titles at no additional cost.

name: Cicadas
summary: Cicadas is an indie adventure galgame about sweet young high school romance. The haunting story is brought to you as visual novel, with beautiful music and voice acting. Interact with pretty girls to push the story forward.

name: City Air Battle
summary: City Air Battle is an arcade style flight racing and shooting game. In the game, you can not only fly all kinds of stunts between skyscrapers, but also compete and fight fiercely with your opponents, and constantly challenge your flight and shooting skills in fast-paced and high-intensity confrontation.

name: Citizen Burger Disorder
summary: A multiplayer burger making sim.

name: Circus Caper
summary:
The single-player, side-scrolling action game takes the player through various levels, each with a circus theme, fighting various enemies and bosses until he finally defeats the ringmaster and save his sister. The player start out in the game with little life and few weapons, but he can collect various icons to increase how many direct hits that he can withstand, keys to open doors, along with various circus items to shoot as projectiles.
Many of the levels can be avoided altogether by just walking backwards and back through the curtain from where the player begins. This will take him right to that level's boss battle.
Bonus levels include such fun things as guiding a bear to jump over flames, avoiding boulders in a car, using Rodan as target practice and meeting Godzilla at the circus grounds.

name: City of Wars Powered by Ryu ga Gotoku
summary: Yakuza Wars is a mobile game developed by BBGame and SEGA. It's a strategic game based on the Like a Dragon series with many characters from the original series.

name: Circus Empire
summary: As a new circus manager, you will not only have to create exciting and varied shows in America, Europe and Asia, but also build attractions around the circus and take care of the performers.

name: City Fighter
summary: City Fighter is a shoot-em-up where players must protect the city of London from a hostile alien invasion.

name: City Blocks
summary: A relaxed highscore puzzle game where you place and upgrade buildings

name: Cipher for Windows
summary: A puzzle game for Windows 3.1 where players must solve substitution ciphers of well-known quotes.

name: CIA Operative: Solo Missions
summary: Running on the Quake engine CIA Operative: Solo Missions places you in the shoes of Jack Noel as you shoot your way through six locations.

name: City Gridlock
summary: City traffic management game. Place road signs and traffic lights to optimize traffic to achieve the best efficiency. You can block or divert cars to avoid traffic jams. Increase road speed where necessary.

name: Circle of Caina SP
summary: Circle of Caina SP is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards.

name: City Z
summary: Put on your armor, choose a rifle or a shotgun - now you are part of a special forces group. Shoot your way out of a skyscraper full of zombies.

name: Cities: Skylines Remastered - Campus
summary: Back to school! In Cities: Skylines - Campus, university life abounds with new area types for any sort of student - Trade School, Liberal Arts and University. Increase the reputation of your campus by attracting students and creating Academic Works to unlock new buildings. Build five types of varsity sports arenas and nine unique faculties, employ seven new policies, earn seven new achievements and take on five new maps! Campus takes higher education to new heights with everything you need to graduate magna cum laude.

name: Circuit Runner
summary: Circuit Runner is a fast-paced cyberpunk game where you collect resources to escape a dystopian tower. Use active and passive skills to outwit enemies and overcome obstacles. Compete on Leaderboards for ultimate bragging rights in this thrilling race for freedom.

name: City Transport Map Volumes 1 & 2 - 2009
summary: Find your way around five major European cities with ease, and have fun, with this handy collection of transport maps.

name: CityManager
summary: Are you tired of working hours and hours and not being paid enough? Welcolme to City Manager in this clicker-incremental game all your dreams will come true... reinvent yourself climb the social pyramid. Make your name stands out! Become rich! and Famous!

name: City Mysteries - Fun Seek and Find Hidden Object Puzzles
Citizen Siege
summary: Lorne Lanning's upcoming non-Oddworld game looks at a politically crumbled future wherein an expatriate is hunted by the government. It is a simultaneous multimedia film/game release.

name: Cityconomy: Service for your City
summary:
Assume the many jobs of a service company and take care of a vibrant metropolis in the open-world city economy simulation Cityconomy. For you, that means: From the classic trash collection to drain cleaning, from towing services to lawn mowing, there's a wide range of missions available across the entire city! A total of 15 vehicles await you, even in multiplayer!

Explore a huge, open-world city with its various districts, such as the old town, industrial park and residential neighborhood. You'll find new tasks for your constantly growing fleet all over the city. If the residents are sat-isfied with you, you'll gain access to new skills, jobs and machines.

Complete realistic jobs in the field of city economy, such as towing cars, cleaning drains, improving roads and trimming hedges, all together with your friends in multiplayer mode. Complete the tasks and ensure that the city's residents are happy and satisfied. Build a company that generates profits and is a pillar of the local economy.

Up to 5 players can take part in multiplayer matches. The player who starts the game acts as the host. Complete a diverse spectrum of jobs together with your friends, or simply have fun in the open world.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles - New York
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles - London
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities: Skylines - Piano Tunes Radio
summary: “Piano Tunes” is the perfect Radio Station for those of you who love classical, whimsical, elegant piano music. With 16 songs and approximately one hour of music, your city will rise flawlessly from your fingertips!

name: Cities in Motion: London
summary: Cities in Motion: London is a new addition to the city-based mass transportation simulation game Cities in Motion. London adds three unique scenarios, 5 new vehicles, and realistic London landmarks to the game.

name: CitiesCorp Concept - Build Everything on Your Own
summary:
CitiesCorp Concept: Design buildings, manage economy and cope with traffic.
A sandbox city building simulation.

name: City of Elves
summary: City of Elves is a fairytale strategy game in which you take a role of a ruler of an elven empire. Build a tree fortress and defend your territory. Develop technology, upgrade your armies, play turn-based scenarios, and expand your territory in this fantasy world of magic!

name: CityDriver: Alvarez-Lentz Marathon 420 CTI
summary: Expand your vehicle fleet by the first ever Van in the history of CityDriver: The Alvarez-Lentz Marathon 420 CTI!

name: CityDriver: Moruga Turbo
summary: Expand your car fleet in CityDriver with the Moruga Turbo DLC. This sleek SUV with 550 horsepower and a 0-100 km/h sprint in 4 seconds will have you whizzing through downtown Munich. The Moruga Turbo has room for 4 people and 4 suitcases, while its powerful combustion engine and automatic transmission make for an exhilarating driving experience. Discover the true meaning of power and style with this SUV DLC!

name: City Z
summary: The virus appeared just six months ago and has already devastated humanity as we knew it. Governments fell one after another. Only a few decimated and isolated groups remain, trying to survive and free their regions from the poison.

name: City Massacre
summary: Zombie first-person shooter with elements of survival

name: Citadale Resurrection
summary: A collection of old-school retro Citadale games in the style of various systems released in the early 1990s. Each game has its own unique look, sound, gameplay style and feel and yet they are all distinctly Citadale.

name: CityBeat: The Sorority Shuffle
summary: Adult Interactive Fiction. Tasked by the chief editor of the Scandals Section, you must put your wits and cunning to work to break a story about sex, secrets, and corruption.

name: Cities in Motion 2: Marvellous Monorails
summary: Marvellous Monorails offers an all-new vehicle type to Cities in Motion 2. The monorail is a handy vehicle for innercity connections and works best in circular lines. The pack boasts five different monorail vehicles, from the slow but very large Toyoka Cybria City, to the super-fast but quite high maintenance Stern-Berger Mate.

name: Circuit Breaker
summary: In the cyber-future of 2009, the most popular sport has become arena fighting. Challengers from all over gather to attempt to conquer gauntlets of robotic opponents for fortune and fame.

name: Circus
summary: Circus is an acrobat game, a clone of the arcade Exidy's Circus

name: Civil War Battles: Shiloh
summary:
This is the first paid release in the new touch Civil War Battles series. This release includes 15 Civil War scenarios from Grant's early offensive campaigns in the west culminating in the Battle of Shiloh. Battles include Belmont, Mill Springs, Fort Henry, and Fort Donelson as well as 8 scenarios addressing both the first and second day of fighting at Shiloh. For the first 7 scenarios, you play the role of US General Grant while for the Shiloh scenarios you play the role of the Confederates out to regain the initiative.
Civil War Battles is a detailed turn-based simulation of combat from the American Civil War. Unit types include infantry, cavalry, artillery, gunboats, and supply wagons as well as leaders which can significantly determine the outcome of a battle just based on their own personal leadership and command abilities. Scenarios in each release generally cover a combination of both historical and “what-if” scenarios allowing you to make decisions as commander of the forces involved that could dramatically affect the outcome.

name: Cicads 3301
summary: And now is your hour! You hid in your bunker for five years, after the epidemic. It's time to get out of it and find supplies that are coming to an end! You only have a knife. Look for supplies, raise and improve your weapons, survive!

name: City Transport Map Volume 1
summary: A pack of maps for various European cities.

name: Cirno's Frog Freeze
summary: Touhou-themed falling block puzzle game. Join Cirno and friends as she clears blocks and freezes frogs. Don't stack too high, or it's game over!

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Tokyo
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Circus Maximus: Chariot Wars
summary:
Circus Maximus is a video game set in Ancient Rome featuring chariot racing. Players compete against other chariots, each with a horse and a gladiator, and compete in death matches where players use their gladiator to fight others to the death. The game takes its name from the out door race track in Rome.

Circus Maximus is most remembered for game play that offered a combination of realistic Roman history and chariot driving with combat sequences. Circus Maximus is regarded as a colossal commercial failure

name: City Night Carnage
summary: City Night Carnage is a first-person survival horror in the setting of a night city. Find weapons and ammunition, first-aid kits and records that reveals what is happening here. But most important is to find a key somewhere nearby that will help you avoid a deadly encounter with HIM!

name: Circle
summary:
Make the circle jump and avoid hitting the line!

How far can you go?

name: Cities: Skylines - PlayStation 4 Edition
summary: Cities: Skylines is an award-winning management game now for PS4 with all of its robust city-simulation gameplay and unique charm along for the ride. Build the city of your dreams! Plan road networks, bus lines and parks. Create smog-filled industrial estates or a quiet beach town powered by renewable energy. Manage policies, energy and economy and play the popular After Dark expansion and make your city a different place at night.

name: Cities: Skylines - Financial Districts Bundle
summary: Financial Districts is the expansion from Colossal Order that adds the “Investments” feature and more than 100 assets to Cities: Skylines. Explore this Expansion together with “Map Pack 2” and “African Vibes” Radio Station in the “Financial Districts Bundle”.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Mexico City
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: City Extreme Driving Collection
summary: The whole city is your playground!

name: Civic Story
summary: When a sudden election rocks the country, whose side are you on? In Civic Story, you'll encounter colourful characters and situations that show how the upcoming election affects you, your colleagues, and the nation in this satirical and insightful 8-chapter Visual Novel about our world today.

name: Citadale: The Accursed Seal
summary: The dark lord Rhogul is about to be resurrected and the only man capable of stopping him is dying. Explore a vast open world in this action game with metroidvania elements and join Arion Dorleac in his final days for one last time...

name: Citron World Forward: Zero
summary: Citron World is an action RPG in which players explore a 2D map, switching between characters with transformable weapons in a world bizarrely developed by a substance called "Citron". Become the "Seeker" and manipulate the search weapon "ArmoND" to find out the truth about the world.

name: Cimmerian Night
summary: Three-map mini-episode with a small base level, a medium-sized nonlinear wizard-style map, and a large homage to E4M4- The Palace of Hate. It comes with custom music tracks. The map sources are incuded.

name: Citytopia
summary: Welcome to Citytopia, an exciting city builder and management game with beautiful 3D graphics and an innovative needs-based objective system. Citizens need goods and work, factories want to create goods and employ workers, and stores are looking for goods and people to supply. Open card packs to build and upgrade all aspects of the city, from buildings to vehicles to the roads themselves. Master the supply chain to transform your city into a thriving metropolis!

name: Cinderella's Spark
summary: Cinderella's stepsister decides she wants to help her... but it seems like she's hiding a terrible secret. A visual novel with six endings, taking the classic fairytale down some unexpected roads.

name: Cicadas: The IQA Edition
summary: Cicadas: The IQA Edition is an indie adventure galgame about sweet young high school romance. The haunting story is brought to you as visual novel, with beautiful music and voice acting. Interact with pretty girls to push the story forward.

name: Cipher Island
summary:
Cipher Island is a cybersecurity educational game.

The great Captain Cipherbeard has sent you on a mission to find his buried treasure across three treacherous islands. The player must use Cryptography to decode ciphers that disclose the treasure's whereabouts.

name: Cinderella's Fairy Tale
summary: Cinderella's Fairy Tale, or just Cinderella, was a game released by Phoenix Games on the PlayStation 2 and Wii.

name: Cielcrosia: Seal of the Lewd Curse
summary: A role-playing game from Lost Age.

name: City Slickers
summary: Welcome to City Slickers, the ultimate co-op sandbox game for you and up to 4 friends! Immerse yourself in a bustling city filled with cars, planes, boats, and NPCs, and let your imagination run wild with a cute physics-based active-ragdoll character!

name: Ciudad Empresarial
summary: Ciudad Empresarial is a vanilla map inspired by the early city levels of A.L.T. and my own previous works, most notably El Viaje de Diciembre. The map takes you through some kind of apartment complex, up onto the roof, down into the parking lot and finally out on the avenue. It's a mostly straightforward layout, and should take you about 20 minutes to beat blind. ﻿There's a catch though: I've added three new monsters through DeHackEd!

name: City Rush
summary:
Lead the cars and beat the time records! Thousands of people love City Rush!
Control the city’s traffic on junctions. Isn’t it the most challenging game ever?
Please note: City Rush is completely free to play but some in-game items such as maps will require payment. You can turn-off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

name: Citadel
summary: Citadel is a platform game with some puzzle solving elements. The game is centered around a castle, requiring players to find five hidden crystals and return them to their rightful place. Outside of the castle there are outside areas (including a wasteland, a pyramid, a sea and an island).

name: City of Gangsters: Bourbon Bootlegging
summary: Cincinnati - On the Ohio River just across from Kentucky with its long history of distilling whiskey and bourbon. A new challenge presented by the city's singular geography with hills, distinct neighborhoods, and the Ohio River cutting off valuable resources in Kentucky.

name: City Rhapsody!
summary: A modern, low-poly, sophisticated city-builder where you get to control (well, almost) everything. Build your dream city. Attract citizens to stay and grow your city with large construction projects. Use everything under your control, from tax rates to fire trucks, to solve your city's problems.

name: Citizen X
summary:
Citizen X is an unreleased Sega Mega-CD game developed by Digital Pictures. It was a side-scrolling action game paired with many full motion video cutscenes set for release in February 1993.

Though the game was not officially released, a mostly-finished prototype emerged and was distributed unofficially commercially by Good Deal Games in 2002.

name: City of Lost Hope
summary: Welcome to the City of Lost Hope. You play as Jaron Mathis, a Private Investigator who recently left the Sector 3 Security in Lost Hope. Unravel the mystery that surrounds his past and dictate his future.

name: Cinematrix
summary: For each square, select a movie that satisfies the two intersecting clues from the x-axis and y-axis. You have nine guesses to fill out the entire grid. A given movie cannot be used twice.

name: Citizens: On Mars
summary: Experience the ultimate turn-based colony building game in Citizens: On Mars! As the leader of a fledgling Martian settlement, your mission is to develop a thriving colony amidst the harsh and unforgiving environment of the Red Planet.

name: Circadian
summary: Circadian is an engaging retro-style RPG. Defend yourself in turn-based combat with strange and bewildering enemies. Solve puzzles, sniffing out all the strange clues about the small suburban village of Mount Olive. Talk with all the quirky villagers, and seek out some help from your friends!

name: City Bus Driver Simulator 2
summary: “Do we have to wait long for the bus?” it's a phrase that will never be heard on your route.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Sports Venues
summary: Sports season never ends with “Sports Venues”, a Content Creator Pack by community modder BadPeanut. From unique stadiums to community sports parks, this Content Creator Pack has everything you need to satisfy your City's needs for sports!

name: Circulate
summary: Master the swivel by guiding spheeres through Circulate's 100 puzzle levels.

name: City Maker
summary: City Maker is a cross between a city builder and a puzzle game, with endless replay-ability! Try to keep your citizens happy while managing spending but most importantly try to stay mayor as long as possible. City Maker offers engaging city building mechanics with unique challenges to test your city making abilities. Don't forget to check out other players' cities in the "city gallery"!

name: Cityquiz.io
summary: Test your geography skills by quizzing yourself to see how many cities you know.

name: Cinnamon Tea
